moreBlocks.articles:
• Wrongful Death
    At Brooks Law Group, our lawyers work closely with clients in difficult emotional times to fully recover what the law allows. We put our experience to work helping survivors and beneficiaries recover what they are due under the law.
  • Truck Accident Injuries
    At Brooks Law Group, we have experience and an impressive track record representing people who have suffered significant injuries in truck accidents.
  • Motorcycle Accident Injuries
    The only way to make sure that you get fair compensation for your motorcycle accident injury is for you to have an attorney who will fight for your rights. The attorneys at the Brooks Law Group will do just that.
  • Premises Liability
    Premises liability cases can be hard to prove, which is why it's important to work with an experienced attorney.
  • Social Security Disability
    Many Social Security Disability benefits applications are denied the first time they are submitted, which is why it's important to have an experienced attorney to represent you through the appeals process.

description:
Brooks Law Group, PA, in Tampa, Florida, has been providing professional legal representation to clients since 1992. At our law firm, we focus on cases pertaining to personal injury, wrongful death claims and Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI). This includes cases pertaining to car, motorcycle and truck accidents, drunk driver accidents, defective drugs, prescription errors, denied SSDI claims and veterans disability benefits.

Whether you are dealing with the wrongful death of a loved one, car accident injuries or a denied disability claim, you may feel overwhelmed by the complexities of the legal system and afraid to seek the help you need. At Brooks Law Group, PA, we operate every day by our slogan: We mean business. Our attorneys provide dedicated, knowledgeable legal representation and personal service to every client who walks through our door. We help them get the best possible resolution to their cases — whatever it takes. This means we don't go for the quick settlement that isn't in your best interest. Instead we will fight aggressively in and out of the courtroom to get the outcome you deserve.

Founding attorney Stephen Brooks is a member of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and has been selected for inclusion in the Top 100 Trial Lawyers in Florida by the National Trial Lawyers Association. He has led our legal team to obtain many large settlements for our clients, including financial recoveries of $2.25 million for the wrongful death of a child in a car accident, $1 million for the family of a man killed in a semi accident and $1 million for a passenger's death in a trucking accident.

Contact our law firm for a free initial consultation about your case. Evening, weekend and home visits are available upon request. Spanish speaking staff is available. - Se habla español.
